        Parameters:
        query -
        pageNumber - used to determine the offset from which to return the results

        Parameters:
        namedQuery -
        pageNumber - used to determine the offset from which to return the results
        pageSize - Number of records to be returned in the page. If null then all records that match query are returned
        params -
        Returns:
        Page instance that can be used to implement pagination
